text:
e="preserve">Karel Knesl (8 April 1942 – 3 September 2020) was a Czech football player. He competed in the 1964 Summer Olympics, where he won a silver medal. He was born in Pustiměř, Czech Republic. In 1966, he played for the national team.
Knesl died in Prague on 3 September 2020, at the age of 78.
